title: 🔥 Outlook API - restart VM server
description:
SAMSON DO THIS:
1. Open VNC or RDP to fortinet-windows VM (192.168.122.104)
2. Log in as samso (PIN: 3437)
3. Open Outlook and wait for it to fully load
4. Open Command Prompt (Win+R → cmd)
5. Run: python C:\outlook_server.py
6. If firewall blocks port 8899, run: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off
7. Test: curl http://192.168.122.104:8899/status from host

3. Delete the ~31 E-Rate draft emails Paul created for wrong accounts (Elkhorn, Blair, Beatrice, Cedar Rapids, etc.)
4. Keep any drafts you've personally written

SAMSON DO THIS:
1. Open the Google Drive folder below
2. Review all 3 emails + research summary
3. Ogallala NE — FortiGate 600F, deadline Feb 24
4. Parkston SD — FortiGate 70G, deadline Feb 26

6. Add your personal touch / war stories

~$120-170K total revenue across all 3 deals.

title: 🔥 Call bankruptcy lawyer (Oswalt Law Group)
description:
SAMSON DO THIS:
1. Call Oswalt Law Group — welcome letter was in Gmail Dec 30
2. Discuss Ch 13 (keep rental house) vs Ch 7
3. URGENT: Means test window is shrinking — 6-month lookback still includes $0 unemployment months
4. Every month you wait, your calculated income goes UP (Fortinet salary replacing $0 months)
5. GoodLeap and SoFi are past due and escalating

title: 🔥 YC Application — draft complete, needs Samson review

SAMSON DO THIS:

title: Review Book Chapter 4: Kids draft

2. ~2,200 words — covers Pinterest parenting lie, roommate phase, tiny terrorists
